member.name: IDxcResult.GetNumOutputs
member.summary: Retrieves the number of outputs available in this result.
member.returns: The number of outputs available in this result.

member.name: IDxcResult.GetOutput
member.param: The kind of output to retrieve.
The interface ID of the output interface.
The address of the pointer that receives a pointer to the output.
The optional address of the pointer to receive the output name blob, if there is one.

member.name: IDxcResult.GetOutputByIndex
member.summary: Retrieves the output kind at the specified index.
member.param: The index of the output to query about.

member.name: IDxcResult.HasOutput
member.summary: Determines whether or not this result has the specified output.
member.param: The kind of output to check for.

member.name: IDxcResult
member.summary: Represents the result of a DXC operation. A DXC operation might have multiple outputs, such as a shader object and errors. This interface provides access to the outputs.
